title: Mirror of Germany. No. 177 = Deutschland Spiegel

description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: A German-Russian athletic contest at Heidelberg University; Dr Kiesinger pays a five-day visit to Japan; a memorial centre in Berlin to commemorate those who resisted Hitler; a striking, new home for old people; an art exhibition on "Industry and Technology in German Painting" staged in the Lehmbruck Museum at Duisburg; beer and coins were taken from Einbeck to Munich for the Olympic fund; a Westphalian rodeo; the German League football final.
